short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to view contextual information about images in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bunked helps you verify the authenticity of images. It performs a search with Bunked and Google, checks for content credentials and watermarks, and collects crowd-funded information about suspected misinformation.
